CustomField.description: This field contains a copy of the value of the user permission PermissionslightningExperienceUser. If TRUE, this user sees a link in the profile menu to switch to Lightning or back to Classic. If FALSE, this user cannot navigate to Lightning.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field contains a copy of the value of the user permission PermissionslightningExperienceUser. If TRUE, this user sees a link in the profile menu to switch to Lightning or back to Classic. If FALSE, this user cannot navigate to Lightning.
CustomField.label: Can Use Lightning
